channel.title: Need help with questions
channel.description:
Hey
I have a few questions
1) how can i make my own client so people have to download the client and can play on my server?
2) Aren't the prayer headicons working on silabsoft!?
3) what can i do againts the lag on my server?

item.title: Need help with questions
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

1.) Get a base client and edit it yourself
2.) Prayer headicons are supposibly glitched in silab’s client since she did say its made of fail. Other clients have this resolved.
3.) Get a 2gb+ ram and comcast high speed internet or a vps with a 1ip per connection ‘code’ for your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with questions
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

go to the tutorial section of the forums… search the stuff there, and to make a client download a client base to start out with.

Read full topic
